title: The.Steve.Harvey.Talk.Show.2015.03.18.(Eng.Subs)-[2Maverick]
description:
First Aired: March 18, 2015

Actress Taraji P. Henson from "Empire" shares sensational details about the season one finale; "The Royals" actresses Elizabeth Hurley and Alexandra Park visit the show; a look at how to revive wardrobes on a budget; a Guiness World Record-breaker.

Credits: Taraji P. Henson (Guest), Elizabeth Hurley (Guest), Alexandra Park (Guest), Lawrence Zarian (Guest), Nick Stoeberl (Guest), Steve Harvey (Host)
